O jogo mais brabo de todos

A Classic. Through a long history of CS franchise, CSGO is one of the most popular game on steam. And it doesn't disappoint. The game's design and build is near perfection. With Quake franchise, it has been a role model of almost every FPS games. Every FPS gamer should play this game at least once. I would recommend this. But like every other FPS games, its cheater is always the problem. Not recommended for those who hates FPS games. Others would enjoy the game.

Spent 30 hours learning the game only to spend the next 500 queuing only Mirage and Dust and getting destroyed by foreigners who were smurfing and cheating. Then I proceeded to spend the next 400 playing only Nuke and throwing every game to make everyone miserable. At this point I was at 900 hours and decided to spend the next 200 learning to bhop effectively and practice my movement and learn surfing. Now at 1,100 hours, I spent the last 49 hours of in game time blatantly walling, aimbotting, and abusing cheats to destroy the foreigners that had caused me so much pain. I am now game banned, but this game is incredibly fun and I can't express my love for it any more. I highly recommend this game, especially since it is now free-to-play.
